issue.title: wtr-lab.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads)
 [http://wtr-lab.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwtr-lab.com)
### Comment
> The domain pubadx.one isn't blocked by adguard dns, i feel that it should be as some of the ads are nsfw

issue.title: www.terabox.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.terabox.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.terabox.com%2F) ### Comment > . Adguarad DNS no bloquea los anucios en algunas aplicaciones, tales como Terabox, 7 minutos entre otras, anex la captura. > > . Ninguna de las Direcciones de servidores DNS cifradas acept en la configuracion directa en Android, en cambio las direccion correspondiente de NextDNS s acepta bien. > > Por favor mejoren el bloqueo en Adguard DNS, que sea comparable quiz con NextDNS. Adguard DNS me gusta porque tiene un panel de control que puedo eliminar dispositivos, pero falta mucho para ser bueno. > > Hago pruebas, porque quiero ofrecer mi Servicios de Asesoria en uso de Aplicaciones para bloqueo de anuncios a usuarios en general. ``` Username: @ExplorerAS ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/odjop8wkf28wsgsgoowws8owccg0goc683obqncuuo.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/39ly0tbtkk00ccwg08ogw00g8g8cosk6y64uu6qjho.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 3 ![Screenshot 3](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/boiyitjtw204o4o8cso8o88gs4wgws4h1y1v1jhmrk.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 4 ![Screenshot 4](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/h77hv8aj6ggs8cc0gg4kgwkogkokg4k6srapogd2wc.jpg?nc=1)

### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://blackboard.istun.edu.tr/?new_loc=%2Fultra%2Fstream](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fblackboard.istun.edu.tr%2F%3Fnew_loc%3D%252Fultra%252Fstream) ### Comment > Using Adguard extension blocks me when I try to use my university's blackboard system. It stucks in login page when I try to log in. But when I disable the adguard extension it doesnt even need login informations and I easly use the blackboard system. ``` Username: @paradogs-7 ``` ### Screenshots
